subject: [Mhln] $269.90 Adobe Creative Suite 3
body:
Give help rather than advice.
Everybody, soon or late, sits down to a banquet of consequences.
The fibers of all things have their tension and are strained like the strings of an instrument.
Mere parsimony is not economy. Expense, and great expense, may be an essential part in true economy.
He who has begun has half done. Dare to be wise begin.
It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
Alimony -- the ransom that the happy pay to the devil.
Democratic societies are unfit for the publication of such thunderous revelations as I am in the habit of making.
Who ever converses among old books will be hard to please among the new.
The irrationality of a thing is no argument against its existence, rather a condition of it.
I don't know who my grandfather was I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
The economy depends about as much on economists as the weather does on weather forecasters.
Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
Cats are smarter than dogs. You can not get eight cats to pull a sled through snow.
Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two.
Words may show a man's wit but actions his meaning.
Some people grin and bear it others smile and do it.
We have a lot of anxieties, and one cancels out another very often.
An old-timer is one who remembers when it cost more to run a car than to park it.
